name: Real-Time & Batch Data Pipelines
description: Design and implement scalable streaming and batch data pipelines using BigQuery, Dataflow, Datastream and Pub/Sub to process 100+ TB/day workloads with millisecond latency.

name: Cloud Architecture & Cost Optimization
description: Architect distributed data platforms on GCP, AWS and Azure, leveraging managed services and infrastructure as code. Optimize performance and cost, cutting cloud spend by up to 80%.

name: Data Warehousing & Modeling
description: Build governed data warehouses and dimensional models using BigQuery and dbt; implement CDC, API and SFTP ingestion patterns and maintain 1,000+ production tables.

name: Machine Learning & Generative AI
description: Develop and deploy ML models including LLMs, RAG pipelines, CNN/RNN, XGBoost and reinforcement learning. Apply RLHF and ZeRO optimization to improve model alignment and reduce compute costs.

name: MLOps & ML Infrastructure
description: Set up end-to-end ML pipelines with Vertex AI, SageMaker, Feature Stores and CI/CD, enabling reproducible training, serving and experimentation.

name: Data Governance, Quality & Observability
description: Implement robust data governance, IAM, row-level security and taxonomies. Design data quality and observability frameworks that boost dataset accuracy to 99.8% and cut incident resolution time by 50%.

name: Backend Engineering & Microservices
description: Develop high-throughput backend services and microservices using Python, Java, FastAPI and Spring Boot. Apply concurrency and multithreading to support 5K+ concurrent requests with sub-200 ms latency.

name: DevOps & Infrastructure
description: Use Docker, Terraform, GitLab CI/CD and Prefect to provision, deploy and orchestrate data and ML infrastructure across environments.

name: Data Visualization & Analytics
description: Create insightful dashboards and visualizations with Looker, Tableau, Power BI and Python libraries (Matplotlib, Seaborn) to communicate data stories effectively.

name: Research & Innovation
description: Explore cutting-edge AI techniques including multi-agent reinforcement learning, fairness in AI, affective state analysis and robotics, translating research into production solutions.
